sqlQuery: INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS"(id, agent_communication_queue, category, isactive, tool_config_json, tool_name) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'NEWRELIC_MILESTONE_EXECUTION', 'APPMONITORING', true, '{}', 'NEWRELIC' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT tool_name FROM public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS" WHERE tool_name = 'NEWRELIC');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS"(id, agent_communication_queue, category, isactive, tool_config_json, tool_name) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'DYNATRACEROI_MILESTONE_EXECUTION', 'APPMONITORING', true, '{"list":[{"label":"Metric Key","name":"metricKey","type":"input","current":{"text":"","value":""},"hide":0,"includeAll":true,"multi":false,"options":[{"selected":false,"text":"","value":""}],"query":"","tooltip":"Enter metric key"}]}', 'DYNATRACEROI' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT tool_name FROM public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS" WHERE tool_name = 'DYNATRACEROI');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS"(id, agent_communication_queue, category, isactive, tool_config_json, tool_name) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'APPDYNAMICS_MILESTONE_EXECUTION', 'APPMONITORING', true, '{}', 'APPDYNAMICS' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT tool_name FROM public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS" WHERE tool_name = 'APPDYNAMICS');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS"(id, agent_communication_queue, category, isactive, tool_config_json, tool_name) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'SPLUNK_MILESTONE_EXECUTION', 'APPMONITORING', true, '{"list":[{"label":"Index Name","name":"splunkIndex","type":"input","current":{"text":"","value":""},"hide":0,"includeAll":true,"multi":false,"options":[{"selected":false,"text":"","value":""}],"query":"","tooltip":"Enter Summary Index"}]}', 'SPLUNK' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS" WHERE tool_name = 'SPLUNK');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS"(id, agent_communication_queue, category, isactive, tool_config_json, tool_name)SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'ELASTICSEARCH_MILESTONE_EXECUTION',  'APPMONITORING', 'TRUE', '{"list":[{"label":"Log Key","name":"logKey","type":"input","current":{"text":"","value":""},"hide":0,"includeAll":true,"multi":false,"options":[{"selected":false,"text":"","value":""}],"query":"","tooltip":"Enter log key"}]}','ELASTICSEARCH' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT tool_name from public."INSIGHTS_ROI_TOOLS"  WHERE tool_name = 'ELASTICSEARCH');
